mapper.update: update schedule_info set parent_id = #{parentId}, type = #{type}, name_id = #{nameId}, name = #{name}, project_type = #{projectType}, project_id = #{projectId}, start_time = #{startTime}, end_time = #{endTime}, is_allday = #{isAllday}, wakeup_id = #{wakeupId}, callon_person = #{callonPerson}, remark = #{remark}, updated_id = #{updatedId}, updated_time = #{updatedTime}, significance = #{significance}, callon_address = #{callonAddress} WHERE id = #{id};

mapper.sql: from (select info.id, con.name contactName, con.post contactPost, info.name schedultMatter, date_format(info.start_time,'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i') startTime, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(info.start_time) startTimeUnix, date_format(info.end_time,'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i') endTime, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(info.end_time) endTimeUnix, date_format(now(),'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i') currentTime, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(current_timestamp()) currentTimeUnix, dct1.name significanceText, dct1.dict_value significance, project.id projectId, project.project_name projectName, case (isnull(sir.id) && UNIX_TIMESTAMP(current_timestamp())>UNIX_TIMESTAMP(info.start_time)) when 1 then 1 else 2 end isInterview, info.is_del isDel, info.created_time createdTime, info.created_id createdId from schedule_info info left join schedule_contacts con on info.callon_person=con.id left join dict dct1 on dct1.parent_code='significance' and dct1.dict_value=info.significance left join sop_project project on info.project_type=1 and info.project_id=project.id left join sop_interview_record sir on sir.schedule_id=info.id where info.type=2 and info.is_del=0 and info.created_id=#{createdId} group by info.id) t
